title: Update libexpat to latest version
body:
## Background

Originally from discussion #3053.

<sup>Originally posted by **jeremy-bridges** November 5, 2024</sup>

Many vulnerabilities are flagged by Black Duck for libexpat. Please update to reduce the security vulnerability profile of SkiaSharp.

![expat vulnerabilities](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0089fbc7-a288-4a42-a275-a00ecc1df86c)

## Status: ✅ Fixed

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Original request | 2.6.3 |
| Updated to | 2.6.4 |
| PR | #3056 (merged Nov 8, 2024) |

## Note

This issue was originally for both libexpat and libwebp. The libwebp portion has been split to #3465.
